name: Hide and Seek (itch) (Snail Rhymer, Tom Rafferty)
name_original: Hide and Seek (itch) (Snail Rhymer, Tom Rafferty)
description:
WASD/Arrow Keys to move and mouse click on horns to find the little monsters and send them to bed

Made in a week for the Godot Wild Game Jam.

A blast of a collab for this game and we both learnt a lot. Since we didn't feel out progress was significantly affected by the coronavirus outbreak, we decided to submit what we had when the first deadline hit. See here for a slightly more polished version, making use of some of the extra time.

Please offer any feedback in the comments below!
